Package database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
database.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for communication with the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Database()
    Creates a connection to the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Turns two members into friends.
    boolean canAddFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Checks if the specified member can be added as a friend.
    boolean canLogin​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Checks if the username and password specified match the entry in the database.
    boolean canRemoveFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Checks if the specified member exists and therefore can be removed from the friends of this user.
    boolean ChangePassword​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Changes the password of a member.
    boolean deleteUser​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Attempts to delete a member from the database with the specified username.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllMembers()
    Queries the database for all the members in it.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFriends​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Queries the database for the friends of the specified member.
    boolean isRegisterAllowed​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Checks if the specified username is allowed to register.
    boolean isUsernameTaken​(java.lang.String username)
    Checks if the username specified is taken.
    void registerNewUser​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Attempts to add a new user to the database.
    boolean removeFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
    Removes a friend from the specified user.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Creates a connection to the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if it cannot connect to the database.

  • Method Details

    • registerNewUser

      public void registerNewUser​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Attempts to add a new user to the database. The username must be unique or a SQLException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username, password and email of the new user.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if it could not register add the user.

    • canLogin

      public boolean canLogin​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the username and password specified match the entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username and password.
      Returns:
      true if username exists and password is correct, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • getAllMembers

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllMembers()
      Queries the database for all the members in it.
      Returns:
      a List of all usernames in the database.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
      Attempts to delete a member from the database with the specified username.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username.
      Returns:
      true if the user was deleted, false if could not delete the user.

    • isRegisterAllowed

      public boolean isRegisterAllowed​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the specified username is allowed to register.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username.
      Returns:
      true if register is allowed, false if not.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • isUsernameTaken

      public boolean isUsernameTaken​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the username specified is taken. The database is queried to check if there is a member whose username is the same as the specified.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the member.
      Returns:
      true if the username is taken, false if it is not.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Turns two members into friends. Inserts the other user as a friend to each member specified in the database.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the usernames of the members to be added as friends.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • canAddFriend

      public boolean canAddFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the specified member can be added as a friend.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username of the friend to add.
      Returns:
      true if friend can be added, false if they cannot be added.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • canRemoveFriend

      public boolean canRemoveFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks if the specified member exists and therefore can be removed from the friends of this user.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the friend's username.
      Returns:
      true if friend can be removed, false if they cannot be removed.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • removeFriend

      public boolean removeFriend​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Removes a friend from the specified user. Deletes the specified friend from the friend entries of this specified user in the database.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - usernames of user and friend.
      Returns:
      true if removed friend succesfully, false if could not remove friend.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • ChangePassword

      public boolean ChangePassword​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Changes the password of a member. Updates the database with the new password of the specified member.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - username and new password of the member.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - a database connection error occurs.

    • getFriends

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFriends​(java.lang.String[] accountInfo)
      Queries the database for the friends of the specified member.
      Parameters:
      accountInfo - the username of the member.
      Returns:
      a List of all the friends of this member.
